pullrequest.title: Disable loading nested models in DART and Simbody

content.raw:
currently there are 3 test worlds: `empty`, `pr2`, and `nested_model`. I think the `empty` world should still work for dart, but this logic would skip that test.

maybe instead:
~~~
  if (_physicsEngine == "dart" &&
      (_world.find("pr2") != std::string::npos ||
       _world.find("nested") != std::string::npos))
~~~
content.html:
currently there are 3 test worlds: empty, pr2, and nested_model. I think the empty world should still work for dart, but this logic would skip that test.

maybe instead:

  if (_physicsEngine == "dart" &&
      (_world.find("pr2") != std::string::npos ||
